title: Semi-trailer catches fire Thursday morning prompting the State Park Dr. off-ramp to close, now reopened; CHP
summary: A semi-trailer caught fire on Thursday morning, prompting the closure of the northbound Highway 1 State Park Dr. off-ramp in Santa Cruz, California. The California Highway Patrol (CHP) reported that the exit has since reopened after cleaning crews cleared debris from the highway. The article does not specify the cause of the fire but highlights the incident's impact on traffic and the subsequent cleanup efforts.

title: Multiple fire agencies responding to a fire in the riverbed near San Lorenzo Park
summary: The article reports on a wildfire named the Broadway Fire, which is currently burning near San Lorenzo Park in King City, California. The fire has spread to five acres, and multiple fire agencies, including Cal Fire, are responding to the incident. Access to the fire is challenging for the crews, and the public is advised to avoid the area while firefighting efforts are underway. The article does not specify the cause of the fire, but it highlights the ongoing efforts to control it in a riverbed area.
